EditTextPreference.android:title: Device Name
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Change the name of the of currently connected robot. When attempting to connect to this robot in the future, this will be the name shown

SwitchPreference.android:title: Power Saving Mode
SwitchPreference.android:summary: This option will limit the speed of the robot to reduce battery consumption

SwitchPreference.android:title: Assisted Driving Mode
SwitchPreference.android:summary: This option will aid in transitioning between horizontal and vertical surfaces

ListPreference.android:title: Video settings
ListPreference.android:summary: Resolution and Frames Per Second (FPS) settings for the recorded video

SwitchPreference.android:title: Save pictures locally
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Pictures taken will be stored on this device as well as the robot. This option requires video streaming to be enabled
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Pictures will only be stored on the robot

SwitchPreference.android:title: Save video locally
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Streamed video will be stored on this device. This option requires video streaming to be enabled
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: No video will be stored on this device
